bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of mu zhong chi mai 目中赤脈 , red vessels in the eyes, with a network of red threads extending from the white part of the eye to the pupil. Xin xiu ben cao 新修本草 Substance Entry que shi 雀屎：雀屎，和男首子乳如薄泥，點目中，弩肉、赤脈貫瞳子上者即 消 , “Sparrow droppings: Mix with the milk for a first male child to prepare a thin paste and swab into the eye. Tumorous flesh growths and red vessels pervading the pupil will then dissolve”.
